doc.title: Magda's Calling
doc.plot: Magda Amer is a 'daiya' or caller for Islam in Cairo, Egypt. She is certified by al-Azhar in Egypt to teach Islam, and teaches in several mosques in Cairo. She is also a doctor and practices alternative medicine, owning a homeopathic shop in a suburb of Cairo. Magda works to educate other women about their rights within Islam.
